page.title: 06RSPCA ANIMAL HOME
page.content: There are 17 kennels at the R.S.P.C.A. Animal Home in Mill Lane, and 16 Catteries all of which have central heating! I am woken by the barking of the dogs and the cats mewing at feeding time, which is 6.00a.m. I pull on my clothes and rush downstairs to help.The dogs' meal is mixed with water and the cats are given{Whiskers} Then it's {noses to the grindstone} exercising the dogs.With aching wrists we are dragged round the lanes and forest walks by a hefty Labrador or Alsatian. Then it's back to the kennels for cleaning.While this is done the dogs are put in the exercise run. Next it's time to feed the goat. At 2.00p.m. we go for a well earned lunch. At 2.30 the gates open and in come the public to choose a dog.
